headline: Costco Wholesale Corporation Announces Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: ISSAQUAH, Wash., Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Costco Wholesale Corporation (“Costco” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: COST) today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend on Costco common stock of $1.30 per share. The quarterly dividend is payable February 13, 2026, to shareholders of record at the close of business on January 30, 2026. headline: I’d Avoid iShares Consumer Staples ETF Right Now
summary: When market volatility picks up, investors typically flock to consumer staples ETFs for defensive characteristics and steady dividends. But the iShares Global Consumer Staples ETF (NYSEARCA:KXI) presents a different story. Despite holding household names like Walmart (NASDAQ:WMT) and Costco (NASDAQ:COST), the fund’s high expenses, modest yield, and concentrated exposure to stocks trading near all-time highs ... I’d Avoid iShares Consumer Staples ETF Right Now
